price: Je! Huwaoni kwamba wao wanatangatanga katika kila bonde?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ
footnotes: Kwani huwaoni vile wanavyo tangatanga katika mabonde ya maneno wala hawaongoki kwenye Haki?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
